com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.datamodel.bapi.types

Class CurrencyType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.serialization.StringBasedErpType<CurrencyType>
      • com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.datamodel.bapi.types.CurrencyType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErpType<CurrencyType>, StringRepresentableKey, Serializable, Comparable<CurrencyType>

    public class CurrencyType
extends StringBasedErpType<CurrencyType>
    Currency type 
      Domain: CURTP
  Length: 2
  Type: CHAR
  Decimals: 0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
